name: Mail Help
description:
Mail Help is a simple VR game in which the player uses his creativity and hands to create a safe path to help the delivery car deliver its mail. 

Important:
Enable Unknown Sources to be able to play the game.

Start Oculus launcher->Settings->General->Unknown Sources

An Oculus Rift , Touch Controllers and Windows is required.

For future games and info visit: https://twitter.com/VRGamesPort
